metadata.dc:author: Rull, S
Sanchís, M J
Anguiz, A
Colomina, J
Palacios, A
metadata.dc:description: Hepatic disorders in AIDS are very common, although the injuries observed are usually non-specific. This is the reason why the real usefulness of hepatic biopsy in this patients is being currently discussed. In this work, such aspect and the hepatic injuries observed in patients with AIDS are discussed. Current indications for hepatic biopsy are summarized, as well as its later manipulation in order to obtain maximum profitability of it.
metadata.dc:title: Hígado y SIDA.
[The liver and AIDS].
